title: Subjective memory concerns and car collisions: A cross-sectional cohort study among older Japanese drivers
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Satoshi Kurita, Takehiko Doi, Kenji Harada, Masanori Morikawa, Chiharu Nishijima, Kazuya Fujii, Daisuke Kakita, Hiroyuki Shimada
